SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT101
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is:
a) sent by a financial institution on behalf of a non-financial institution account owner, to an account servicing financial institution or to a forwarding financial institution for further transmission to the account servicing institution.
b) sent by a non-financial institution account owner, or a party authorised by the account owner, to an account servicing financial institution or to a forwarding financial institution for further transmission to the account servicing institution.
It is used to move funds from the ordering customer's account(s) serviced at the receiving financial institution or at the account servicing institution, or from an account(s) owned by the ordering customer which the instructing customer has explicit authority to debit, for example, a subsidiary account.
The MT 101 can be used to order the movement of funds:
a) between ordering customer accounts, or
b) in favour of a third party, either domestically or internationally.

Validation.Comment: This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Identifier Code must not be a BEI, ie must not be of subtype BEID, MCCO, TESP or TRCO
CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)
CreditDebit should contain the following codes
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
One of the following codes must be used (Error code(s): T47).

Code.Name: CHQB
Code.Description: Pay beneficiary customer by cheque only. The optional account number line in field 59a must not be used.

Code.Name: CMSW
Code.Description: This transaction contains a cash management instruction, requesting to sweep the account of the ordering customer.

Code.Name: CMTO
Code.Description: This transaction contains a cash management instruction, requesting to top the account of the ordering customer above a certain floor amount. The floor amount, if not pre-agreed by the parties involved, may be specified after the code.

Code.Name: CMZB
Code.Description: This transaction contains a cash management instruction, requesting to zero balance the account of the ordering customer.

Code.Name: CORT
Code.Description: This transaction contains a payment that is made in settlement of a trade, eg, foreign exchange deal, securities transaction.

Code.Name: EQUI
Code.Description: This transaction contains an instruction requesting to pay the beneficiary customer an amount in one currency, equivalent to an instructed amount in a different currency.

Code.Name: INTC
Code.Description: This transaction contains an intra-company payment, ie, a payment between two companies belonging to the same group.

Code.Name: NETS
Code.Description: This transaction contains a payment that should be settled via a net settlement system, if available.

Code.Name: OTHR
Code.Description: Used for bilaterally agreed codes/information. The actual bilateral code/information needs to be specified in Additional Information.

Code.Name: PHON
Code.Description: This transaction requires the beneficiary to be contacted by telephone and should be followed by the appropriate telephone number. This code is meant for the last financial institution in the chain.

Code.Name: REPA
Code.Description: Payment has a related e-Payments reference.

Code.Name: RTGS
Code.Description: This transaction contains a payment that should be settled via a real time gross settlement system, if available.

Code.Name: URGP
Code.Description: This transaction contains a time sensitive payment which should be executed in an expeditious manner.

Validation.Comment: Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency.
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Identifier Code must not be a BEI, ie must not be of subtype BEID, MCCO, TESP or TRCO
CreditDebit should contain the following codes
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Identifier Code must not be a BEI, ie must not be of subtype BEID, MCCO, TESP or TRCO
CreditDebit should contain the following codes
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Identifier Code must not be a BEI, ie must not be of subtype BEID, MCCO, TESP or TRCO
CreditDebit should contain the following codes
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency.
One of the following codes must be used (Error code(s): T08):

Code.Name: BEN
Code.Description: All transaction charges, including the charges of the financial institution servicing the ordering customer’s account, for the subsequent credit transfer(s) are to be borne by the beneficiary customer.

Code.Name: OUR
Code.Description: All transaction charges for the subsequent credit transfer are to be borne by the ordering customer.

Code.Name: SHA
Code.Description: All transaction charges other than the charges of the financial institution servicing the ordering customer account are borne by the beneficiary customer.

fieldvalidation.name: U09
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "User has used tag 119 in a message that is not a candidate for special processing"

fieldvalidation.name: U03
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When populating an end-to-end reference, both fields 111 and 121 must be populated: a message that contains only one of these two fields will not be accepted by FIN."

fieldvalidation.name: C1
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If an exchange rate is given in field 36, the corresponding forex deal must be referenced in field 21F."

fieldvalidation.name: C2
fieldvalidation.comment: C2: In each occurrence of sequence B, if field 33B is present and 'amount' in field 32B is not equal to zero, then field 36 must be present, otherwise field 36 is not allowed (Error code(s): D60).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of sequence B, if field 33B is present and 'amount' in field 32B is not equal to zero, then field 36 must be present, otherwise field 36 is not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C3
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Field 50a (option F, G or H), must be present in either sequence A (index 5) or in each occurrence of sequence B (index 15), but must never be present in both sequences, nor be absent from both sequences."

fieldvalidation.name: C4
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Field 50a (option C or L), may be present in either sequence A (index 4), or in one or more occurrences of sequence B (index 14), but must not be present in both sequences A and B."

fieldvalidation.name: C5
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If field 33B is present in sequence B, its currency code must be different from the currency code in field 32B in the same occurrence of sequence B."

fieldvalidation.name: C6
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Field 52a may be present in either sequence A or in one or more occurrences of sequence B, but must not be present in both sequences."

fieldvalidation.name: C7
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If field 56a is present, field 57a must also be present."

fieldvalidation.name: C8
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If field 21R is present in sequence A, then in each occurrence of sequence B, the currency code in fields 32B must be the same."

fieldvalidation.name: C9
fieldvalidation.comment: C9: In each occurrence of sequence B, the presence of fields 33B and 21F is dependent on the presence and value of fields 32B and 23E as follows(Error code(s): E54).
fieldvalidation.formula: If(B.F32B[0].Amount == 0, If(FieldValueExistsInAtLeastOne(B.F23E, "Instruction_Code", "EQUI"), B.F33B.$size > 0, B.F33B.$size == 0 && B.F21F.$size == 0), true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of sequence B, if 'amount' in field 32B is equal to zero, the following conditions apply: a) if field 23E is present and code equals EQUI, then field 33B is mandatory, b) if field 23E is present and code NOT equals EQUI, then fields 33B and 21F are not allowed and c) if field 23E is NOT present, then fields 33B and 21F are not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-51A-A
fieldvalidation.comment: "Field 51A is only valid in IFT."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Field 51A is only valid in IFT."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-23E-A
fieldvalidation.comment: "Additional Information is only allowed when Instruction Code consists of one of the following codes: CMTO, PHON, OTHR and REPA."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Additional Information is only allowed when Instruction Code consists of one of the following codes: CMTO, PHON, OTHR and REPA."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-23E-B
fieldvalidation.comment: "In each occurrence of Sequence B, when field 23E is repeated, the same code word must not be present more than once with the exception of OTHR. The code word OTHR may be repeated."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of Sequence B, when field 23E is repeated, the same code word must not be present more than once with the exception of OTHR. The code word OTHR may be repeated."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-23E-C1
fieldvalidation.comment: "In each occurrence of sequence B, when field 23E is used more than once, the following combinations are not allowed: CHQB with CMSW, CHQB with CMTO, CHQB with CMZB, CHQB with CORT, CHQB with NETS, CHQB with PHON, CHQB with REPA, CHQB with RTGS, CHQB with URGP."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of sequence B, when field 23E is used more than once, the following combinations are not allowed: CHQB with CMSW, CHQB with CMTO, CHQB with CMZB, CHQB with CORT, CHQB with NETS, CHQB with PHON, CHQB with REPA, CHQB with RTGS, CHQB with URGP."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-23E-C2
fieldvalidation.comment: "In each occurrence of sequence B, when field 23E is used more than once, the following combinations are not allowed: CMSW with CMTO, CMSW with CMZB."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of sequence B, when field 23E is used more than once, the following combinations are not allowed: CMSW with CMTO, CMSW with CMZB."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-23E-C3
fieldvalidation.comment: "In each occurrence of sequence B, when field 23E is used more than once, the following combination is not allowed: CMTO with CMZB."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of sequence B, when field 23E is used more than once, the following combination is not allowed: CMTO with CMZB."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-23E-C4
fieldvalidation.comment: "In each occurrence of sequence B, when field 23E is used more than once, the following combinations are not allowed: CORT with CMSW, CORT with CMTO, CORT with CMZB, CORT with REPA."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of sequence B, when field 23E is used more than once, the following combinations are not allowed: CORT with CMSW, CORT with CMTO, CORT with CMZB, CORT with REPA."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-23E-C5
fieldvalidation.comment: "In each occurrence of sequence B, when field 23E is used more than once, the following combination is not allowed: NETS with RTGS."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of sequence B, when field 23E is used more than once, the following combination is not allowed: NETS with RTGS."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-23E-C6
fieldvalidation.comment: "In each occurrence of sequence B, when field 23E is used more than once, the following combinations are not allowed: EQUI with CMSW, EQUI with CMTO, EQUI with CMZB."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of sequence B, when field 23E is used more than once, the following combinations are not allowed: EQUI with CMSW, EQUI with CMTO, EQUI with CMZB."

fieldvalidation.name: ERI
fieldvalidation.comment: "For specific message types, an European currency must not be used as the currency of settlement after a cut-off date (Error Code: E76)."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "For specific message types, an European currency must not be used as the currency of settlement after a cut-off date (Error Code: E76)."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-50b-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-50b-A With option F, subfield 1 (Party Identifier), one of the following line formats must be used (Error code(s): T54): Line format 1 :/34x (Account) Line format 2 :4!a/2!a/27x (Code)(Country Code)(Identifier)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Party Identifier' value. One of the following line formats must be used: /34x (Account) or 4!a/2!a/27x (Code)(Country Code)(Identifier)"

fieldvalidation.name: FA-50b-B
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-50b-B In option F, when subfield 1 Party Identifier is used with the (Code)(Country Code)(Identifier) format, one of the following codes must be used (Error code(s): T55): ARNU, CCPT, CUST, DRLC, EMPL, NIDN, SOSE and TXID."
fieldvalidation.formula: Implies(A.F50b.FormatOption == 'F', Verify50FPartyIdCode($value)) /* get the code from party identifier if format is 4!a/2!a/27x */
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Party Identifier' value. When 'Party Identifier' is used with the format (Code)(Country Code)(Identifier), one of following codes must be used: ARNU, CCPT, CUST, DRLC, EMPL, NIDN, SOSE and TXID."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-50b-C
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-50b-C With option F, subfield 2 (Name and Address), the following line format must be used for all lines: 1!n/33x (Number)(Details). (Error code(s): T54).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Name and Address' value. With option F, subfield 2 (Name and Address), the following line format must be used for all lines :1!n/33x (Number)(Details)."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-50b-D
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-50b-D In option F, subfield 1 (Party Identifier) used with the (Code)(Country Code)(Identifier) format: Country Code must be a valid ISO country code (Error code(s): T73).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Party Identifier' value. In option F, subfield 1 (Party Identifier) used with the (Code)(Country Code)(Identifier) format: Country Code must be a valid ISO country code."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-50b-E
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-50b-E With option F - subfield 2 (Name and Address), should start with Number 1 to 8 and it should follow the line formatting rules as specified in the SWIFT spec (Error code(s): T56).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Name and Address' value. With option F - subfield 2 (Name and Address), should start with Number 1 to 8 and it should follow the line formatting rules as specified in the SWIFT spec."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-50b-F
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-50b-F Number 4 must be followed by a valid date in the format YYYYMMDD and this date, local to the sender, must not be later than the date on which the message is successfully sent to SWIFT (Error code(s): T50).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Name and Address' value. Number 4 must be followed by a valid date in the format YYYYMMDD and this date, local to the sender, must not be later than the date on which the message is successfully sent to SWIFT."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-50b-G
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-50b-G Numbers 3, 5, 6 and 7 must be followed by a valid ISO country code (Error code(s): T73).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Name and Address' value. Numbers 3, 5, 6 and 7 must be followed by a valid ISO country code."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-50b-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-50b-A With option F, subfield 1 (Party Identifier), one of the following line formats must be used (Error code(s): T54): Line format 1 :/34x (Account) Line format 2 :4!a/2!a/27x (Code)(Country Code)(Identifier)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Party Identifier' value. One of the following line formats must be used: /34x (Account) or 4!a/2!a/27x (Code)(Country Code)(Identifier)"

fieldvalidation.name: FB-50b-B
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-50b-B In option F, when subfield 1 Party Identifier is used with the (Code)(Country Code)(Identifier) format, one of the following codes must be used (Error code(s): T55): ARNU, CCPT, CUST, DRLC, EMPL, NIDN, SOSE and TXID."
fieldvalidation.formula: Implies(B.F50b.FormatOption == 'F', Verify50FPartyIdCode($value)) /* get the code from party identifier if format is 4!a/2!a/27x */
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Party Identifier' value. When 'Party Identifier' is used with the format (Code)(Country Code)(Identifier), one of following codes must be used: ARNU, CCPT, CUST, DRLC, EMPL, NIDN, SOSE and TXID."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-50b-C
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-50b-C With option F, subfield 2 (Name and Address), the following line format must be used for all lines: 1!n/33x (Number)(Details). (Error code(s): T54).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Name and Address' value. With option F, subfield 2 (Name and Address), the following line format must be used for all lines :1!n/33x (Number)(Details)."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-50b-D
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-50b-D In option F, subfield 1 (Party Identifier) used with the (Code)(Country Code)(Identifier) format: Country Code must be a valid ISO country code (Error code(s): T73).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Party Identifier' value. In option F, subfield 1 (Party Identifier) used with the (Code)(Country Code)(Identifier) format: Country Code must be a valid ISO country code."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-50b-E
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-50b-E With option F - subfield 2 (Name and Address), should start with Number 1 to 8 and it should follow the line formatting rules as specified in the SWIFT spec (Error code(s): T56).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Name and Address' value. With option F - subfield 2 (Name and Address), should start with Number 1 to 8 and it should follow the line formatting rules as specified in the SWIFT spec."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-50b-F
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-50b-F Number 4 must be followed by a valid date in the format YYYYMMDD and this date, local to the sender, must not be later than the date on which the message is successfully sent to SWIFT (Error code(s): T50).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Name and Address' value. Number 4 must be followed by a valid date in the format YYYYMMDD and this date, local to the sender, must not be later than the date on which the message is successfully sent to SWIFT."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-50b-G
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-50b-G Numbers 3, 5, 6 and 7 must be followed by a valid ISO country code (Error code(s): T73).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Name and Address' value. Numbers 3, 5, 6 and 7 must be followed by a valid ISO country code."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-50a-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-50a-A The BIC must be a BEI, i.e. must be of subtype BEID or TRCO or MCCO or SMDP or CORP (Error code E57).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The BIC must be a BEI, i.e. must be of subtype BEID or TRCO or MCCO or SMDP or CORP (Error code E57)."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-50b-H
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-50b-H The BIC must be a BEI, i.e. must be of subtype BEID or TRCO or MCCO or SMDP or CORP (Error code E57).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The BIC must be a BEI, i.e. must be of subtype BEID or TRCO or MCCO or SMDP or CORP (Error code E57)."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-50a-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-50a-A The BIC must be a BEI, i.e. must be of subtype BEID or TRCO or MCCO or SMDP or CORP (Error code E57).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The BIC must be a BEI, i.e. must be of subtype BEID or TRCO or MCCO or SMDP or CORP (Error code E57)."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-50b-H
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-50b-H The BIC must be a BEI, i.e. must be of subtype BEID or TRCO or MCCO or SMDP or CORP (Error code E57).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The BIC must be a BEI, i.e. must be of subtype BEID or TRCO or MCCO or SMDP or CORP (Error code E57)."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-32B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-59a-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Name_and_Address_Details' value. With option F - subfield 2 (Name_and_Address_Details), should start with Number 1 to 3 and it should follow the line formatting rules as specified in the SWIFT spec for field 59F."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-59a-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Name and Address Details' value. With option F, subfield 2 (Name and Address Details), the following line format must be used for all lines :1!n/33x (Number)(Name and Address Details)."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-59a-C
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Name_and_Address_Details' value. Number 3 must be followed by a valid ISO country code."
